--------------------------------------------------------------
 libgrf - grf archive manipulation library
--------------------------------------------------------------


Overview
--------

Libgrf is a C++ library for manipulating 'grf' archives, used by the client
for the MMORPG 'Ragnarok Online' by the south korean Gravity Corporation.


Acknowledgement
---------------

This library is derived from 'libgrf' by MagicalTux <MagicalTux@ooKoo.org> 
at http://www.grfbuilder.com/. Code is from http://ookoo.org/svn/grf/ r105.
